name: magidoc
description: MagiDoc is a documentation website generator for GraphQL based on Svelte and that allows for infinite customization through plugins.
author: Sunny Pelletier

scripts.build-ci: pnpm -r --filter './packages/plugins' build && pnpm -r install && pnpm -r --filter '!./packages/plugins' build
scripts.patch: pnpm version --no-git-tag-version patch | xargs pnpm -r exec pnpm version --allow-same-version --no-git-tag-version
scripts.minor: pnpm version --no-git-tag-version minor | xargs pnpm -r exec pnpm version --allow-same-version --no-git-tag-version
scripts.major: pnpm version --no-git-tag-version major | xargs pnpm -r exec pnpm version --allow-same-version --no-git-tag-version
